volunteer.location: University of Puerto Rico, Mayagüez Campus
volunteer.summary: As part of the Tasktool team, I am responsible for overseeing all electrical components required to accomplish specific tasks in the NASA Human Exploration Rover Challenge (HERC) held in Huntsville, Alabama.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
